description: Aspose.Tasks for .NET is a .NET Project management component that enables .NET applications to not only read and manipulate Microsoft Project documents in MPP and XML formats but to also write Microsoft Project documents in MPP or Project XML format - all without using Microsoft Project.
releaseNotes:
Bugs
 
TASKS-33403 All Tasks shown as Summary Tasks when MPP re-saved using Aspose.Tasks
TASKS-33407 Cannot calculate critical path properly with SS Task link and lag
TASKS-33410 TaskNotes doesn't support Chinese
TASKS-33414 Wrong Gantt chart view when PercentComplete changed using Aspose.Tasks
TASKS-33415 Cannot write 24-hour calendar to mpp properly.
TASKS-33419 Cannot write Resource.BaselineWork, Resource.BaselineCost fields to mpp 2013 correctly.
 
Enhancement
 
TASKS-33231 Control over the task display properties similar to MSP task formatting
TASKS-33396 Implement meta data writing for mpp format.
summary: Aspose.Tasks for .NET is a component to work with Project files
title: Aspose.Tasks for .NET
